release.action: <jx:out xmlize="true"/> problem: val.toString().getBytes() effected in xml parsing errors (uses default platform encoding while parser expects utf-8). Introduction of <jx:out xmlize="true" encoding="..."/> should be considered.
Add support for jx:element - the instructions that allow dynamic element creation.
Add check for name correctness in jx:attribute.
Fix exception handling in script manager. Do not wrap processing exception into SAXException.

New syntax for jx:attribute tag: apart from <jx:atttribute name="text" value="abc"/> one can do: <jx:atttribute name="text">abc</jx:attribute> This is most useful for nesting jx:* tags: <jx:attribute name="value"><jx:formatDate value="${date}" pattern="dd MMMM yyyy" locale="pl_PL"/></jx:attribute>
JXTG: Pluggable expression parser. New expression syntax: ${expr}, #{expr} -> {jexl:expr}, {jxpath:expr}. This is a target syntax for CTemplate.
Support for following use cases: <jx:out value="${xmlString}" xmlize="true" strip-root="true"/> and <jx:out value="${domDocument}" strip-root="true"/>
Fix a bug in <jx:set> that caused considerable performance problems.
JXTemplateGenerator's ScriptManager uses transient store to cache parsed templates.
